column4: for the 3rd and final time: can someone point me to someone/somewhere where i can receive help with this nautilus background error?
will ya calm down,most of the peope here are volunteers and so ust ask politely
i have been trying to ask nicely, but ive asked 3 times over the span of  a half hour/45 minutes, and ive been ignored each time when people after me have asked for help
